author: William Fiuza

text: This music cracks me up! I listen to this when I go home from work after 8 pm.  I admire music artists who could do this with the limitations of a system like the snes.  I used to be a big fan of Asterix and Obelix, played most of their games but this song I recalled the most.  I remember playing this game with my brother, those days it was no problem to go to a video rental shop and rent the game.  The sea level was hard as hell hahaha
